page.title: 09Skelton Grange Power Station
page.content: Last Wednesday some of the group went to{Skelton Grange power station. We had to walk there, passing the {sewage works}on the way. It smelled so bad that it nearly made me sick. When we arrived we watched a video on the power station. It told us how{electricity}was made. Then they gave us some{helmets.}They had {ear-muffs}on them. We had a look at the things that were at the bottom of the building, like the{turbine}machines. Then we saw the{cooling towers,}which were outside. Then the scary part came. We all went up in a lift to the top of the building. It was really high and the worst thing about it was that the floor was a grating, so I had to take my shoes off and walk around in bare feet. Thank God I could go home later!
